text.section: The board of trustees may provide for sole source procurement contracts in accordance with the provisions of this section.

section.section: Whenever the procurement officer determines that there is only one available source for the subject of a procurement contract, the procurement officer may award the procurement contract without competition to that source.

Before awarding a procurement contract to a sole source, the procurement officer shall obtain:
The approval of the board of trustees; and
Any other approval required by law.
